translations: 部署（deploy 的过去式）；展开

sentences.sentence: Tanks have been deployed all along the front line.
sentences.translation: 沿整个前线已部署了坦克。

sentences.sentence: Riot police are being deployed throughout the city to prevent any trouble.
sentences.translation: 防暴警察正部署至全城以防止骚乱。

sentences.sentence: Multiples can be deployed in combination for more complex missions than could be achieved by one CubeSat alone.
sentences.translation: 与单独使用一颗立方体卫星相比，多颗卫星可以组合部署用于更复杂的任务。
